title: Meditation: The Space of Loving Awareness (2020-07-08)
itunes:title: Meditation: The Space of Loving Awareness
description: Meditation: The Space of Loving Awareness - This meditation begins by guiding us through a scan: to open to inner space and aliveness, then to outer space, and then continuous space, filled with the light of awareness. We explore how every experience belongs to this infinite awake space of our Being, and can be held with tenderness and love.
